apps.name: BHTwitter
apps.subtitle: Awesome tweak for Twitter
apps.versionDescription:
Moved from Monkeydev to Theos
Convert all swift files to Objective-c.
 Add new script to build BHTwitter project easily.
Support JB rootfull and rootless.
Fix crashing in downloading longer video and freezing using FFmpeg.
New option to hide bookmark button.
apps.localizedDescription:
Download Videos (even if account private).
Custom Tab Bar
No history feature.
Hide topics tweet feature.
Disable video layer caption.
Padlock.
Font changer.
Enable the new UI of DM search.
Auto load photos in highest quality feature.
Undo tweet feature.
Theme (like Twitter Blue).
App icon changer
Twitter Circle feature.
Copying profile information feature.
Save tweet as an image.
Hide spaces bar.
Disable RTL.
Always open in Safari.
Translate bio.
Disable new tweet style (A.K.A edge to edge tweet)
Enable voice tweet and voice message in DM.
Hide promoted tweet from the timeline.
Confirm alert when hit the tweet button.
Confirm alert when hit like button.
Confirm alert when hit follow button.
FLEX for debugging.

versions.localizedDescription:
Moved from Monkeydev to Theos
Convert all swift files to Objective-c.
 Add new script to build BHTwitter project easily.
Support JB rootfull and rootless.
Fix crashing in downloading longer video and freezing using FFmpeg.
New option to hide bookmark button

apps.localizedDescription:
uYou is the best tweak for the YouTube app.
 
 uYouEnhanced is a modified version of uYouPlus & uYou with even more features.
 
 Additional features:
 • Skip sponsorships in videos (iSponsorBlock)
 • Even more PiP options (YouPiP)
 • Unlock 1440p and 2160p resolutions (YTUHD)
 • Disable overlay at the end of videos (YTNoHoverCards)
 • Remove YouTube Premium upsell alerts (NoYTPremium)
 • Enable to Dim the YouTube UI (LowContrastMode)
 • Enable the miniplayer for all videos (YTMiniplayerEnabler)
 • Prevent the notch/Dynamic Island from cutting into 2:1 videos (DontEatMyContent)
 • Configure A/B settings in the YouTube app (YTABConfig)
 • And more
 
 More information: 
 https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/ 
 
 Requires iOS 14.0 or later.
 
 Contributors: MiRO92, qnblackcat, PoomSmart, level3tjg, BandarHelal, galactic, julioverne, HASHBANG, Lyvendia, Foxster, ichitaso, Ahmed Bafkir, CokePokes, Tommy Teo, theos, and many others.
apps.name: uYouEnhanced
apps.subtitle: The best tweak for the YouTube app just got even better
apps.versionDescription:
• Updated YouTube to 19.06.2
 • uYou is using 3.0.2
 • Full changelog: 
 https://github.com/arichornlover/uYouEnhanced/releases/tag/v19.06.2-3.0.2

apps.name: Streamer
apps.subtitle: App for Streaming Movies and TV shows
apps.versionDescription:
Implemented VLC and Infuse players integration 
Improved Real-Debrid integration performance and accuracy 
Added a feature to choose “priority foreign language” for torrents in Real-Debrid
Resolved PIP issue for Apple TV
Resolved crash when tapping on the play button on the movie details page on Apple TV
Added provider logos to the favorites list
Unified subtitle parsing logic and removed extra HTML tags from all subtitles
Resolved issue when playing a completed episode
Resolved issues for movies or TV shows with incorrect data for the same title
apps.localizedDescription:
App for Streaming Movies and TV shows on iOS and tvOS.

- Stream all TV shows and Movies from multiple websites without any annoying ads
- Supports Chromecast to stream to FireTV and Chromecasts
- Supports multi-language subtitles for iOS and tvOS
- Favorite functionality to quickly access your favorite shows and movies

Supported providers:
-🇺🇸 MovieBoxPro (Streamer Pro users only): 4k English content with multi-language subtitles
-🇺🇸 Flixtor.video: English content with multi-language subtitles and HQ streaming
-🇺🇸 FlixHQ.to: English content
-🇺🇸 PutLocker.vip: English content
-🇺🇸 123moviesfree.so: English content with English subtitles
-🇩🇪 KinoKiste.club: German content
-🇩🇪 FilmPalast.to: German content
-🇸🇦 Akwam.to: Arabic content
-🇸🇦 CimaNow.cc: Arabic content
-🇸🇦 Arabseed.ink: Arabic content
-🇸🇦 FaselHD.vip: Arabic content
-🇰🇷 ViewAsian.co: Asian content
-🇯🇵 Kaido.to: Anime content
-🇯🇵 GogoAnimeHD.to: Anime content

 More Info:
 https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer

permissions.usageDescription: Streamer uses the local network to discover Cast-enabled devices on your network.
App would like to access IDFA for ad tracking purpose but you can opt-out.

versions.localizedDescription:
Implemented VLC and Infuse players integration 
Improved Real-Debrid integration performance and accuracy
